graduate.translation[0].definitions[0].d: someone who has completed a university degree, especially a first degree
graduate.translation[0].definitions[1].d: someone who has completed a course at a college, school etc
graduate.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to obtain a degree, especially a first degree, from a college or university
graduate.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Kate graduated from medical school last year.
He graduated in physics from Cambridge University.
graduate.translation[1].definitions[1].d: to complete your education at high school
graduate.translation[1].definitions[1].e: Jerry graduated from high school last year.
graduate.translation[1].definitions[2].d: to give a degree or diploma to someone who has completed a course
graduate.translation[2].definitions[0].d: relating to or involved in studies done at a university after completing a first degree
graduate.translation[3].definitions[0].d: a person who has completed a university degree course, especially for a first degree
graduate.translation[3].definitions[0].e: a science graduate from Oxford University
The company is looking for a graduate engineer with the ability to lead and motivate a team of four people.
graduate.translation[3].definitions[1].d: a person who has completed a course at a college or school
graduate.translation[4].definitions[0].d: a graduate student is someone studying for their second degree
graduate.translation[5].definitions[0].d: to obtain a degree, especially a first degree, from a college or university
graduate.translation[5].definitions[0].e: He graduated from the University of California with a degree in mathematics.
graduate.translation[5].definitions[1].d: to complete your education at HIGH SCHOOL
graduate.translation[5].definitions[2].d: to give a degree or DIPLOMA to someone who has completed a course
graduate.translation[5].definitions[3].d: to start buying a product etc that is better than the one you bought before
graduate.translation[5].definitions[3].e: They bought low-priced homes after graduating from rooming houses and apartments.
